name: Daikaijuu Monogatari: Poyon no Dungeon Room
overview: Daikaiju Monogatari, a game featuring Poyon, a character who is very popular with MOZ cards. "Digging low pre" that digs the soil and pushes through the dungeon buried in the soil. There is a "room" in the dungeon, which also includes an adventure element to talk with various people in it and solve the mystery. Summoned beasts also appear in the dungeon, and become friends by winning the battle. With communication cable support, you can give items, copy summoned beasts, and play online battles.
